# delete_graph

**Category:** Core Operations

## Description

Delete a graph by ID.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| `graph_id` | `str` | Yes | `-` | ID of the graph to delete |

## Returns

**Type:** `Dict[str, Any]`

Deletion status

Located in: `src/networkx_mcp/server.py:180`
